browser_not_supported_description.name:
This new type of Vend set is very easy to use -- it's just drag n' drop -- as long as you are using a supported browser. Unfortunately, Safari is the only major browser not supported: the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Opera and even Microsoft's Edge all support folder uploads. So, spark up just about any other browser, and get uploading! The list of tested and supported browsers:

  • Chrome 21+
  • Firefox 50+
  • Opera 15+
  • Microsoft Edge

If you are seeing this message and you aren't using Safari, your browser is either out of date or a browser we haven't tested. Please update or switch browsers.

uploadset_description.name: Single Category - Upload via this CMS

categoryset_description.name: Multiple Categories - Upload via this CMS

zipfile_description.name: Multiple categories - FTP a Zip file

dropboxset_description.name: Use Dropbox to Offer Digital Downloads

expires_on_date.name: Date and Time Site Expires (timezone aware)

pin_to_top_of_splash_bool.name: Pin To Top Of Gallery Wall

set_cover_image_asset.name: Gallery Image (use a 16:9 aspect ratio for best results) (must be larger than 800px in either direction to display)

zipfile_directions.name:
To create categories, you are going to FTP a zip file to a specified location on your server.

1. Create a zip file with organized folders of images. Those folder names will become your category names. The zip file name should match exactly as it is seen below at the end of the path (ie: a023.zip).

2. FTP your zip file to the location specified below. The path below (ie: /vend-proofing-data/uploads/XXXX.zip) outlines the location that your new zip file should be uploaded to.

You will have to create the "uploads" folder if you haven't yet done so and place the zip file into that folder.

3. Once you FTP your zip file to the proper location, please click the “Verify Zip File” button below.

4.You can then move your folders up or down in order. However, you can not organize/rename folders and images. If you want to make changes, you will have to re-upload/replace the zip with a modified zip file of the same name.

zip_verify_warning_description.name:
Do not panic -- just read carefully!

Please proceed with the verification if you are verifying this set for very the first time or have not shared this set with any clients yet.

If you have already shared this set with a client, please be aware that re-verifying this set is not necessarily a good idea. Since we can't be sure that the new zip file's images and image order are exactly the same as before, we must clear existing client sessions/carts/favorites to eliminate any inconsistencies. If any orders have already been placed, the order's file and financial information will remain intact, however the image thumbnails may no longer be correct.

zip_verify_failure_description.name: We cannot seem to verify the zip file. Please re-check the instructions, and try again.

dropbox_sync_directions.name:
Full Directions Here

Go to your Dropbox account or drive and create a folder with the folder name given below in your Vend App Folder.

Copy your high resolution images into this folder. Depending on the number of images you have, this could take hours. HINT: If you would like to categorize your images (i.g. reception, ceremony, bridal party, etc), name the folders that you place in the set folders with the category names and add the images to the appropriate folder.

Once the images are uploaded to Dropbox, you will click the "Sync" button below.

Once the files are synced, it will show you the date and number of images that are in this set. If you change anything in this Dropbox set folder, you must resync the folder. Once you send out the link to the client is is best not to re-sync anything.

dropbox_verify_warning_description.name:
Do not panic -- just read carefully!

Please proceed with the sync if you are syncing this set for very the first time or have not shared this set with any clients yet.

If you have already shared this set with a client and/or if you have existing orders for this set, please be aware that re-syncing this set is not a good idea. Since we can't be sure that all your images are exactly the same as before, we must clear existing client sessions/carts/favorites to eliminate any inconsistencies. If any orders have already been placed, the order's file and financial information will remain intact, however the image thumbnails may no longer be correct and any digital downloads that have been purchased will no longer be able to be downloaded.

dropbox_verify_warning_accept.name: I Understand, Continue With Dropbox Sync

dropbox_now_syncing_description.name:
Sync in progress. Please do not close your browser or change views. Depending on how many images, this process may take quite a few minutes.

Progress: {PROGRESS}%

dropbox_setup_failure.name: Communication with Dropbox failed. If you have made changes to your App settings, moved your product, or reset your Setup tab, you need to re-authorize your account. Please reset your Dropbox Authorization Code.

php_version_530_required.name: PHP version 5.3.0 or greater is required for Dropbox integration. Please contact your hosting provider to see if they can update your server's PHP version or contact us for more information about hosting Vend to support Dropbox.

tsm_opportunity_description.name:
Triple Scoop Music is the amazing music licensing service loved by the world's leading photographers and event filmmakers. TSM’s award-winning song library offers more than 15,000 hand-picked songs that will help you supercharge the emotion and energy of your slideshows, websites and more.

Simply click Import Music and we'll preload 5 Triple Scoop Music tracks into your Global Music Library free for you to use with this product. To learn more about how Triple Scoop Music and Intothedarkroom are working together, please visit http://intothedarkroom.com/triple-scoop-music/ and learn how you can save 10% on all of your music purchases.

tsm_opportunity.name: Free Music From Triple Scoop Music

system_backup_success_description.name:
The backup file has successfully been created.
Please click the Download Now button to download it to a safe place. We recommend regularly backing up your data.

system_backup_failed_description.name: The backup has failed. This is probably due to limitations on your server, added with the possibility that you may have enourmous amounts of data. Not every server is created equally, and unfortunatley, we are bound by the limitations of your server. Sorry!

update_available_description.name: There is a update available for your software installation. The most current version is {CURRENT} and your installed version is {INSTALLED}. We HIGHLY recommend updating your software as soon as possible.

init_description.name: You are seeing this message because you have recently installed this product. You will need to setup your admin panel, and create some content, as there is no content yet to display. Please refer to your introduction email for further assistance, or click the link below to visit the resources site.

intial_page_description.name:
If you just installed this product for the first time, you're almost there!

We just need to do some last minute initialization for you to get started. This form will create your user account, and initialize the software so you can login and start using it. Please make sure that the email address is a valid email address, and please make sure your secret question/answer is something you'll remember.

If you ever forget your login/password, you'll need it to get back in the system.

If you have recently updated your software, please note:

CLEAR YOUR CACHE!!
CLEAR YOUR CACHE!!
CLEAR YOUR CACHE!!

Thanks! And enjoy your new product!

unsaved_changes_description.name: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to ignore these changes and continue?

delete_set_confirmation_description.name: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action will permanently delete this item and settings associated with it. This action can not be un-done.

delete_files_confirmation_description.name:
Are you sure you want to delete these files?
This action can not be un-done.

revert_confirmation_description.name:
Are you sure you want to revert these settings?
This action can not be un-done.
All settings will be reverted to factory settings, and any changes you have made will be lost forever.

cancel_changes_confirmation_description.name:
Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?
This action can not be un-done.
Any changes you have made will be reverted to the last saved version.
